verbose_text: Accordingly, the exposure of 3T3-L1 cells to anti-adipogenic compounds, such as 5-aminoimidazole-4-carboxamide-1-beta-d-ribofuranoside (AICAR), epigallocatechin gallate (EGCG), platycodin D or 1,25-dihydroxyvitaminD3 [1,25 (OH) 2 D 3] has been shown to induce the upregulation of DVL.
evidence: platycodin D or 1,25-dihydroxyvitaminD3 [1,25(OH) 2 D 3 ] has been shown to induce the upregulation of DVL
